name: Employed adults in the United States, by workforce type: 2010–19
description: Employed adults in the United States, by workforce type: 2010–19

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

notes: Data include workers 16–75 years old and exclude those in military occupations or currently enrolled in primary or secondary school.
sources: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS), 2010–19, Public Use Microdata Sample (PUMS), data as of 25 October 2020.Science and Engineering Indicators
